title: 【悬赏】服务器报错 右键就会报错！呼叫大触！
txt_content:
拿着武器点击右键后台就会报错

报错内容：

2014-07-18 19:56:24 [SEVERE] Could not pass event PlayerInteractEvent to GuiShopManager v1.3.2
org.bukkit.event.EventException
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:437)
        at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:62)
        at org.bukkit.plugin.TimedRegisteredListener.callEvent(TimedRegisteredListener.java:31)

        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:464)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R3.event.CraftEventFactory.callPlayerInteractEvent(CraftEventFactory.java:217)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_6_R3.event.CraftEventFactory.callPlayerInteractEvent(CraftEventFactory.java:187)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.func_72472_a(NetServerHandler.java:864)

        at net.minecraft.network.NetServerHandler.func_72570_d(NetServerHandler.java:233)
        at net.minecraft.network.NetworkListenThread.func_71747_b(NetworkListenThread.java:54)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServerListenThread.func_71747_b(DedicatedServerListenThread.java:34)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:910)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:330)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:777)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:659)
        at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(ThreadMinecraftServer.java:16)
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.black_ixx.bossshop.addon.guishopmanager.GSMItems.playerClicked(GSMItems.java:147)

replies.txt_content: 知道是bossshop和guishopmanager问题 但是有办法不删除插件解决么

1.删除
2.自己反编译了看看
org.black_ixx.bossshop.addon.guishopmanager.GSMItems.playerClicked(GSMItems.java:147)
? ? ? ? at org.black_ixx.bossshop.addon.guishopmanager.PlayerListener.onInteract(PlayerListener.java:106)

GSMItmes 第147行
PlayerListener 第106行
自己修吧
你去找org.black_ixx.bossshop.addon.guishopmanager.PlayerListener.onInteract 找到这个后 可以删除括号里面的东西 这样就不会报错了 不过也不能用右键打开背包 如果不知道如何删除 直接在首行加个return;

replies.author: 小孩不乖
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

1277832129 发表于 2014-7-18 22:56
你去找org.black_ixx.bossshop.addon.guishopmanager.PlayerListener.onInteract 找到这个后 可以删除括号 ...
Addon是BossShopAddon.class么= =

491960546 发表于 2014-7-19 00:26
Addon是BossShopAddon.class么= =
不是 是一个包
